00035   class LeapSeconds : public VRTObject {
00037     public: __attribute__((deprecated)) __intelattr__((deprecated))
00038             static const int32_t     J1970TOJ1950       = 631152000; // (7305 days) * (86,400 sec/day)
00039 
00041     public: __attribute__((deprecated)) __intelattr__((deprecated))
00042             static const int32_t     GPS2UTC            = 315964811; // (3657 days) * (86,400 sec/day) + (~11 leap sec)
00043 
00047     public: static const int32_t     UTC2TAI_LS_1970    =         8; // ~= 8.000082
00048 
00052     public: static const int32_t     GPS2TAI_LS_1980    =        19;
00053

00055

00060     private: vector<int64_t>  yearStartUTC;

00070 
00072     public: LeapSeconds (const LeapSeconds &ls);
00073 
00074     public: virtual bool isNullValue () const {
00075       return (startDatePOSIX.size() == 0);
00076     }
00077

00089

00095       setDefaultInstance(getInstance(fname));
00096     }

00171       return getStartOfYearUTC(getYear(utc));
00172     }

00210

00221 
00231     public: static inline int32_t isLeapYear (int32_t year) {
00232       return (year % 4 == 0 && (year % 100 != 0 || year % 400 == 0));
00233     }
